whoWeAre.description: Technaz Consult is an engineering consulting firm specialized in providing advisory services to manage, operate, and maintain technologies in the business field to serve enterprises and organizations. We help our partners achieve more sustainability through supportive applications and technical expertise.

1.title: Wireless and Fiber Connectivity Advisory
1.description: We specialize in spectrum analysis, coverage mapping, optimal antenna placement, network CAPEX/OPEX, IBS design, RF design and optimization, mission-critical networks, feasibility studies and route planning, OSP engineering, 5G backhaul, SON-controlled fiber networks, and Quantum Key Distribution (QKD), ensuring compliance with ITU, MCIT, and CST regulations.

2.title: Smart City Strategies & Planning
2.description: Define long-term smart city goals aligned with sustainability, efficiency, and citizen well-being. Assess infrastructure and identify transformation areas using Digital Twins, Satellite, IoT, and best practices.

3.title: Network Performance
3.description: Benchmarking and performance optimization strategies for capacity planning, scalability, RF interference mitigation, band steering, and 5G network slicing optimization.

4.title: Project Management
4.description: Professional project management ensuring timely delivery and quality across telecom and smart city initiatives with expert oversight and coordination.

5.title: MEP Engineering
5.description: Comprehensive mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering solutions for modern infrastructure and smart city developments using cutting-edge technology.

stats.title: We are The Best in Industry
stats.description: Top companies trust Digit to expertly match them with high-quality, vetted talent for their most critical projects.

1.title: 01 - Wireless and Fiber Connectivity Advisory
1.description: We specialize in spectrum analysis, coverage mapping, optimal antenna placement, network CAPEX/OPEX for wireless deployments, IBS design, RF design and optimization, mission‑critical networks, feasibility studies and route planning, OSP engineering, 5G backhaul solutions, SDN‑controlled fiber networks, and Quantum Key Distribution (QKD), ensuring adherence to ITU, MCIT, and CST regulations.

2.title: 02 - Smart City Strategies & Planning
2.description: With Technaz Consult, define long‑term smart city goals aligned with sustainability, efficiency, and citizen well‑being. Assess current infrastructure and identify areas for smart transformation using Digital Twins, Satellite, IoT, and best practices.

3.title: 03 - Network Performance
3.description: Capabilities in benchmarking and performance optimization strategies for network capacity planning, RF‑interference analysis, and 5G network slicing optimization for balanced scalability.

testimonials.q4: Highly recommend their services! The team went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect.
